name: SLEDGEGUN
description:
THE LAST BASTION OF CIVILIZATION HAS BEEN DESTROYED

IOWA has been nuked. DEATH DRONES have been birthed from the fallout and are OUT FOR BLOOD. Only YOU can stop them.

Use the most advanced technology known to man: the SLEDGEGUN. Hit enemies with the sledgehammer to cycle the gun!

GOOD LUCK. IOWA NEEDS YOU.

FEATURES!!!

  • Fast-paced arena FPS action!
  • Painful graphics!
  • Grimy music!
  • Addictive gameplay loop that will leave your life in shambles!
